Articles.Content:
7/10

I don't understand the reference, but I won't dock points for that.

+2 that typography... There is hope for humanity.

+1 Not cluttered.

+2 Not your own images, but I assume that's part of the reference I don't get.

+3 assuming you made this, you made it well.

-1 that mouse has... an atmosphere?

10/10 Still laughing from the quote
Good ol Al. 10/10

7/10

Nice quotes, especially the last one.
8/10 exactly

5/10

+1 the second one's some deep stuff

+1 not cluttered

+1 Not distracting from the post

+2 I really need to change my points system to fir this kind of thing...

-1 grammatical innacuracies (including missing quotation marks, but that's not bad enough to dock extra points)

-1 It's a little... Plain.

When I put it like that, it seems kind of a low score... It isn't even as bad as you'd expect from a 3, I need to change my points system . (yeah, I gave you extra for that)

7/10

-It's seems to be a little broken, I mean, it's me or the ribbons are placed a little stangely? (It's also a little hidden)

+But it's a cool quote though...

but until that, 10/10 for numberzez.

+1 Great quote

+1 Good layout
